name: Rolling-Imax-Processor
summary: This script processes raw intensity measurement data stored in a nested Year to Month to Day folder structure. It reads data in millimeters per second (mm/sec) from Excel files, calculates rolling maximum values for intensity classes, and outputs results in millimeters per minute (mm/min) for intensity classes I1 to I60.
author: Akshar Singh Rawat, Dr Sadikul Islam, Dr M Muruganandam
